Package it.polimi.se2018.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cell
    The class represents a Cell of a Pattern.
    CellTest
    The class to test the methods of the class Cell.
    DiceBag
    The class represents the DiceBag.
    DiceBagTest
    The class to test the class DiceBag.
    Die
    The class represent a six-sides Die.
    DieTest
    The class to test the methods of the class Die.
    DraftPool
    The class represents the dice in the draft pool at a certain moment in the game.
    Game
    The class that represents the status of the game
    ObjectiveCard
    The abstract class that contains common features of Objective Cards.
    Pattern
    The class represents a Window Pattern Card.
    PatternTest
    Tests the methods of the class Pattern.
    Player
    This class represents a Player of the Game.
    PlayerTest
    The class to test the methods of Player.
    PrivateObjectiveCard
    PrivateObjectiveCard represents all private objective cards.
    PrivateObjectiveCardTest
    Unit tests for PrivateObjectiveCard class.
    PublicObjectiveCard
    The class for PublicObjectiveCards.
    PublicObjectiveCardTest
    Unit tests for PublicObjectiveCard.
    RoundTrack
    This class represents the round track in the game.
    RoundTrackTest  
    ToolCard
    This class represents a tool card in the game.
    ToolCardTest  
    Turn
    Class representing a turn in the game.
    TurnManager
    This class is responsible for the correct flow of turns in a game.
    TurnManagerTest  
    TurnTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Colour
    This enum represent the colours used in the game.
    Restriction
    This enum represents the three possible restriction that have to be satisfied in the use of 'Eglomise Brush', 'Copper Foil Burnisher' and 'Cork-backed Straightedge' ToolCard.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DieValueException
    Unchecked exception thrown by the Die when building a Die with value out of the 1-6 range.
    NotEnoughTokensException
    Exception thrown by consumeTokens in Player when the number of tokens to be used are more than the actual number of tokens owned by the Player.
    PlacementErrorException
    Exception thrown when the placement of a Die doesn't respect some restriction imposed by the Game's rules at a 'local' level, on a Cell or at a 'global' level, on a Pattern
